title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label in the UI.
OB: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height remains the same. The label's height does not adjust to accommodate the new font size.
EB: The label's height should automatically adjust to match the font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the UI
2. Find a label
3. Modify the font size of the label
4. Observe that the label's height does not change even though the font size has been modified.
